name: stuart
text: What part of Being John Malkovich is he referring to?

name: arbys
text:
Presumably the part where Malkovitch goes in the tunnel and into a world where everyone is him.

Just like the next strip shows like five Rod Huggins.

name: arbys
text: Er, the one after it, I mean.

name: tangram
text: I think he's talking about Ray "being John Malkovich" for fifteen minutes...like in the whole movie.

name: falseprophet
text:
It says Error: Not a valid date.

You have to pay for dinner AND a movie, or else it doesn't count.

name: spinynorman
text: Yeah, I fucking screwed the pooch on that one.

name: falseprophet
text: No problem man. I got your back.

name: erutangis
text: This strip combines the awesome of a Doors reference in the title with the absurdity of a Super 8 where they let you throw yourself through the walls.

name: lungfish
text: So we can infer that Ray has a wig for porn producing and cameo-appearing occasions
